text: Monis is a surname of the following people: * Monis Bangladesh * Ernest Monis (1846–1929), French politician * Hank Monis (1923–2011), Canadian musician * Judah Monis (1683–1784), North America's first college instructor of Hebrew language * Man Haron Monis (1964–2014) Iranian-born Islamic extremist Other meanings: * Moni people, indigenous people of Western New Guinea
title: Monis
